QuestData.Title: Wee Little Shenanigans
QuestData.Description: So... we bought some cheap grains in bulk. It turned out the grain was infested with sprites.$b$bI HATE sprites. With their wee beady eyes and constant smiling.$b$bI would like to resolve this quietly. Can I buy your services to discreetly eliminate some of these grain thieves?
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh good, they didn't turn you into a frog yet. I saw them do that once you know.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for your help stranger! Hopefully we can deal with the rest on our own from here.
